name: cost-manager-rest-4-processes
description: Learning scaffold: 4-process Express/Mongoose REST services with computed monthly report and MongoDB logs

scripts.install:all: npm --prefix services/users-service install && npm --prefix services/costs-service install && npm --prefix services/logs-service install && npm --prefix services/admin-service install
scripts.dev: concurrently -n users,costs,logs,admin -c auto "npm --prefix services/users-service run dev" "npm --prefix services/costs-service run dev" "npm --prefix services/logs-service run dev" "npm --prefix services/admin-service run dev"
